QuestData.Title: Stronger Than Bone
QuestData.Description: This giant jade tiger pillar doesn't seem to fit in amidst the hozen buildings.$B$BWhat it does seem is very hard. Very solid.$B$BYou know just the person to bring this to.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Jade Tiger Pillar to Jojo Ironbrow in Morning Breeze Village.
QuestData.RewardText: GOOD! A true challenge. Let us put this pillar to the test!
